MS MCQs

    Deploy Microsoft Teams Rooms

    »

    1. Which of the following is NOT a consideration when standardizing your Teams Rooms deployments?

      Shipping

      Scalability

      Lighting


    2. What is the role of the console in Teams Rooms?

      It is the heart of teams Rooms and all components connect to it.

      It is the center of table device used to manage the meeting.

      It is the front of room display that shows meeting content.


    3. What is the role of the resource account?

      It signs in to Windows on Teams Rooms.

      It schedules the meetings that happen on Teams Rooms.

      It’s the account that is invited to meetings on behalf of the room.


    4. Where in Microsoft 365 admin center do you go to create a resource account?

      Rooms & equipment

      Users

      Roles


    5. What two modules are required to create a Teams Rooms account in PowerShell?

      Microsoft Online and Azure Active Directory

      Exchange Online and Skype for Business Online

      Microsoft Online and Exchange Online


    6. How can the Places feature help your users when scheduling meetings?

      It allows you to add additional parameters to a meeting room, such as wheelchair accessibility.

      It allows you to assign meeting rooms to buildings.

      It helps secure the resource account from data leakage.
